trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the shift parameter mask constants in Visual Basic 6.0.
In Visual Basic 6.0, shift parameter mask constants were used to represent the state of modifier keys in the `Shift` parameter of various key and mouse event handlers.
In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the parameters for key and mouse events have changed, and these constants are no longer necessary.
These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbAltMask" name="vbAltMask" href=""></xref>.
Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbCtrlMask" name="vbCtrlMask" href=""></xref>.
Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbShiftMask" name="vbShiftMask" href=""></xref>.
